articles.author: NDTV Sports Desk
articles.title: "Feel So Inferior": James Anderson's Tribute To Virat Kohli In Post-Retirement Speech - NDTV Sports
articles.description: James Anderson bows out as the third highest-wicket taker in the longest format of the game, only behind Sri Lanka's Muttiah Muralitharan (800) and Australia's late great Shane Warne (708).
articles.content: Arguably the greatest fast bowler to have ever played the game, England's James Anderson played his final Test on Friday as the hosts trounced West Indies by an innings and 114 runs at the Lord's. An… [+1653 chars]
